data.subject: 갈 때 가더라도
data.lyric:
빈손으로 왔다 가는 게 인생이라지만 
 그렇다고 빈손으로 살순 없잖아
 살아있잖아 우리는 살아있잖아 
 이렇게 살아있잖아 
 갈 때가더라도 갈 때가더라도 
 누릴 건 누리면서 살아

data.subject: 꽃잎
data.lyric:
그리운 사람 이 밤도 
 꽃잎으로 내게 다가와 
 아름다운 너의 미소 
 내 마음 설레이게 해 
 오늘 밤에는 어떤 느낌 
 내일은 또 다른 느낌 
 내게로 다가와 
 나만을 생각

data.subject: 줌마 Rocker
data.lyric:
어느 조용한 바닷가 마을에
 자그마한 집을 짓고 살고 싶어 
 창문 넘어 파란 바다가 있고
 텃밭엔 상추랑 허브도 심어 놓고
 사랑하는 나의 아들 딸아
 나무처럼 물만 줘도 
 잘

data.subject: The Flame Still Burns
data.lyric:
I live a life that's not real
 Where all that I feel has no meaning
 My life is like an ever spinnin

data.subject: Give My Life For Love
data.lyric:
Born into a perfect world
 The best of everything
 Innocent and unaware
 What destiny would bring
 O

data.subject: I Don`t Want To Live Without You
data.lyric:
I find myself in a strange situation
 And I don't know how
 What seemed to be an infatuation
 Is so

data.subject: Break It Up (Live) (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Made myself a prisoner
 I locked myself away
 Can't remember the last time
 I saw the light of day

data.subject: Girl On The Moon (Live) (Remastered)
data.lyric:
It's night, again
 Time for my mind to go wandering
 Off on a journey, through space and time
 In se

data.subject: Save Me (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Somewhere along the way
 We lost each other
 Somewhere along the way
 To one another
 Somewhere alon

data.subject: Say You Will (Acoustic) (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Say you will, say you won't
 Make up your mind tonight
 Say you do, say you don't
 Wanna be mine
